requirement.en: Send up to 2 cards from your hand to the Graveyard.
requirement.de: Lege bis zu 2 Karten von deiner Hand auf den Friedhof.
requirement.es: Manda al Cementerio hasta 2 cartas en tu mano.
requirement.fr: Envoyez max. 2 cartes depuis votre main au Cimetière.
requirement.it: Manda fino a 2 carte dalla tua mano al Cimitero.
requirement.ja: 手札を２枚まで墓地へ送って発動できる。
requirement.ko: 패를 2장까지 묘지로 보내고 발동할 수 있다.

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Destined Power Destruction!!

ko.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Destined Power Destruction!!
